definitions.text: a metal frame or container holding cartridges; can be inserted into an automatic gun
an instance or single occasion for some event
examples: he could do ten at a clip

definitions.text: any of various small fasteners used to hold loose articles together
an article of jewelry that can be clipped onto a hat or dress
the act of clipping or snipping

examples: he gave me a clip on the ear

definitions.text: sever or remove by pinching or snipping
run at a moderately swift pace
cultivate, tend, and cut back the growth of
examples: dress the plants in the garden

definitions.text: terminate or abbreviate before its intended or proper end or its full extent
examples: Personal freedom is curtailed in many countries
